name: D2L SDBOR Dark Theme
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix(https://d2l.sdbor.edu) {

    html,
#d2l_body,
.d2l-body,
div.d2l-page-main,
div.d2-widget-content > div.d2l-placeholder-live > div.d2l-collapsepane,
header > nav > div,
#all-courses,
.d2l-typography .d2l-htmlblock,
.daylight .d2l-collapsepane .d2l-collapsepane-content,
.daylight .d2l-collapsepane .d2l-collapsepane-header.d2l-collapsepane-collapse,
.daylight .d2l-collapsepane .d2l-collapsepane-content,
.daylight .d2l-collapsepane .d2l-collapsepane-header.d2l-collapsepane-collapse,
.d2l-page-main-padding,
.d2l-navigation-s-centerer,
.d2l-table:not([style-scope]):not(.style-scope) > *:not([style-scope]):not(.style-scope) > tr:not([style-scope]):not(.style-scope),
d2l-tr:not([style-scope]):not(.style-scope),
.d2l-dropdown-content-1 .d2l-dropdown-content-width.d2l-dropdown-content,
div.dco div.dco_c,
div.dco_f div.dco_c,
.d2l-navigation-s,
.d2l-navigation-s-no-login,
.daylight .homepage-container div:last-of-type .d2l-widget:last-child,
.d2l-navigation-s-header,
.daylight .d2l-datalist-nesteditem-accordion.d2l-datalist-nesteditem-accordion-open,
div.d2l-page-main-padding > div.d2l-htmlblock > p,
.ddial_o2,
.d2l-foldername > .dco_c,
.d2l-column-flip-main,
.d2l-column-flip-side,
.d2l-column-main,
.d2l-column-flip .d2l-column-side-bg,
.d2l-datalist .vui-list > li > div > div,
.daylight .d2l-datalist > .d2l-datalist-nesteditem-accordion .d2l-datalist > .d2l-datalist-nesteditem-accordion.d2l-le-DataListItem-Selected > .d2l-datalist-item-content.d2l-datalist-item-content-first,
.daylight .d2l-datalist-nesteditem-accordion,
.daylight .d2l-datalist-nesteditem-accordion > .d2l-datalist-item-content.d2l-datalist-item-content-first,
div.d2l-dropbox-submissiontext > * > * > * > * > * > * > *,
.d2l-branding-navigation-background-color,
d2l-enrollment-card > * > *
{
    background-color: #2c2e2e;
}
.daylight .d2l-msg-container .d2l-msg-container-text,
.d2l-panel,
.daylight .d2l-le-disc-post-unread {
    border-radius: .4em;
    background-color: #2c2e2e;
}
div[role=region].d2l-widget,
.d2l-htmlblock > p,
.d2l-widget-content-padding,
div[role=region].d2l-widget.d2l-tile,
.d2l-custom-widget,
.d2l-custom-widget,
.daylight-widget-demarcation .homepage-container div:last-of-type .d2l-tile.d2l-widget:last-child,
.d2l-htmlblock ol,
.d2l-htmlblock ul,
div.d2l-custom-widget[role=region] > * > * > * > * > * > * > div,
.vui-list > .vui-active {
    background-color: #484848;
}
.d2l-typography .d2l-htmlblock p,
.d2l-htmlblock ul {
    margin-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    padding-bottom: .5em;
}
.daylight .d2l-collapsepane .d2l-collapsepane-header,
.daylight .d2l-collapsepane .d2l-collapsepane-header,
.d2l-twopanelselector-side-bg.d2l-twopanelselector-side-sep,
.d2l-twopanelselector-side.d2l-twopanelselector-side-sep,
.daylight .d2l-messagebucket-button-container + #AB_DL_PH_Messages .d2l-datalist-container {
    background: linear-gradient(#2c2e2e 0, #2c2e2e);
}
div.d2l-widget-content,
#d_page_title,
td > label > span,
div.d2l-textblock,
.d2l-textblock-seondary,
h2,
div.d2l-widget-content > div > div.d2l-textblock-strong,
div.d2l-widget > div.d2l-widget-header > div.d2l-homepage-header-wrapper > h2.vui-heading-2,
div.d2l-widget > div.d2l-widget-header > div.d2l-homepage-header-wrapper > a > h2.vui-heading-2,
.d2l-navigation-s-has-branding .d2l-navigation-s-header-logo-area > .d2l-navigation-s-link,
.d2l-page-header .d2l-page-title,
html,
#d2l_body,
.d2l-body,
div.d2l-page-main,
div.d2-widget-content > div.d2l-placeholder-live > div.d2l-collapsepane,
header > nav > div,
#all-courses,
.d2l-typography .d2l-htmlblock,
.d2l-login-portal-footer,
.d2l-my-settings-profile-info .d2l-textblock,
div.d2l-alert,
div.alert-wrapper,
.d2l-calendar-mini-day,
div.dco > div > label,
.d2l-icon-0,
.d2l-navigation-s-group-text,
.d2l-navigation-s-item > a.d2l-navigation-s-link,
.d2l-navigation-s-personal-menu-wrapper,
.d2l-body-small,
#descriptionShowSecondaryWindowsId,
#descriptionTurnOffRichTextEditorId,
tbody,
.daylight .d_tabs_header td.d_tabs_c_s a,
.d2l-typography .d2l-body-small,
div.dco,
div.dco_f,
.vui-label,
.daylight .d2l-msg-container .d2l-msg-container-text,
.daylight .d2l-calendar-mini-day,
div.d2l-htmlblock > p > span > strong,
.d2l-branding-navigation-dark-foreground-color a.d2l-navigation-s-link,
.d2l-branding-navigation-dark-foreground-color a.d2l-navigation-s-link:link,
.d2l-branding-navigation-dark-foreground-color a.d2l-navigation-s-link:visited,
.d2l-branding-navigation-dark-foreground-color .d2l-navigation-s-group .d2l-navigation-s-group-text,
.d2l-branding-navigation-dark-foreground-color .d2l-navigation-s-group .d2l-navigation-s-group-wrapper d2l-icon {
    color: white;
}
div.d2l-alert,
div.alert-wrapper,
.d2l-calendar-mini-day,
label[for="password"],
label[for="userName"],
ul > li > a > span,
#z_b {
    color: #2c2e2e;
}
.d2l-navigation-s-logo-wrapper,
.d2l-minibar-menu-separator {
    display: none;
}
.daylight .d2l-calendar-mini-today {
    color: #f00;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.d2l-navigation-s-header,
.daylight .d2l-sep-s > hr {
    border-color: gray;
}
div[role=region].d2l-widget,
.daylight .homepage-container div:last-of-type .d2l-widget:last-child,
.d2l-navigation-s-header {
    border-bottom: none;
}
.d2l-navigation-s-no-branding .d2l-navigation-s-main {
    border-top: none;
}
.d2l-le-calendar-day-events tr,
.d2l-le-calendar-week-events,
.d2l-le-calendar-week-all,
.d2l-le-calendar-week-days,
.d2l-le-calendar-month,
.d2l-le-calendar-week-header,
.d2l-le-calendar-month,
.d2l-le-calendar-week-all-wrapper,
.d2l-le-calendar-week-wrapper,
.d2l-le-calendar-day-header,
.d2l-le-calendar-day,
#mceu_0-body,
.d2l-htmleditor-iframecontainer,
.d2l-le-calendar-event-overlay > * > * {
    background-color: white;
}
.d2l-page-main-padding > .d2l-datalist-style1 > .d2l-msg-container,
.d2l-page-main-padding > .d2l-placeholder > .d2l-datalist-style1 > .d2l-msg-container,
.d2l-page-main-padding > form > .d2l-datalist-style1 > .d2l-msg-container,
.d2l-datalist-outdent > .d2l-msg-container,
.d2l-navigation-s-main, .d2l-card-0 {
    border: none;
}
div.d2l-htmlblock {
    border-radius: .5em;
}
}
